title: Naan
ingredients: ['1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '225ml (8 fl oz) warm water', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '3 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk', '1 egg, beaten', '1 dessertspoon salt', '800g (1 3/4 lb) bread flour', '2 cloves garlic, minced (optional)', '50g (2 oz) butter, melted']
